column1: The Pit Room////The only issue is the consistency of the food quality.  Don't get me wrong
column2: I've never had an outright bad experience at Pit Room
column3: it just alternates between Pretty Good and Great.  For example
column4: sometimes the meat isn't quite warm enough or the Brisket is a little too dry.  Having been to Killen's several times now
column5: the consistent quality of the food there has never failed to impress me.
